formattedAddress: 2256 2nd Ave 2nd floor, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2256 2nd Ave 2nd floor, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: WORST DOCTORS OFFICE EVER . Do not COME HERE DR. BUCKMAN AND HIS EMPLOYEES ARE VERY UNPROFESSIONAL ESPECIALLY JUDY THE HR MANAGER. I was an employee there for one week I was not compensated for my full hours of work. . I worked 35 hours they said I only worked 24 hours I got my check a month later . Which was only for 375.00 . I was originally supposed to get paid 575.00 being that they didn't take taxes off and make me sign a paper stating I wouldn't get a W2 at the end of the month. Which I didn't get a copy off . when I asked to see the cameras in their office they refused to let me back in the building . Saying I'm harrassing their staff when I never even did that . I originally left because they gave me one day notice of getting vaccinated and insisted that if I didn't get vaccinated by the very next day I could not return to work . I am furious with this company for the fraud being done by DR.BUCKMAN and his employees and am now having to take legal action . PLEASE DONT TRUST DR BUCKMANS OFFICE !

originalText.text: I was also not notified that my provider, Smith, was no longer with them until I went for an appt. Dr Bukhman is very good and provides simple terminology in discussing medical conditions and treatment. The only downfall I have encountered, is there turn around time in completing patient's medical forms. They State it takes 10 days, when in reality it takes them 30 or more days to complete. Mind you one has to make numerous calls to office to get these done, which is unacceptable.

originalText.text:
This clinic is beginning to slack on professionalism. E.g. I was given a an appt. For 8/25 but was contacted 8/24 and told my Doc would not be in on schedule date. Also was told I would be contacted with a NEWER appt. sometime soon. 2 month's later still NO appt. but now attempting to see my Doc I'm being notified my Doc no longer work there and the soonest I can be seen is late November. Is it my fault staff at Bukhman Medical 2256 2nd ave has a lack of concern for the physician's clients, and is it possibly that my primary care doctor noticed the unprofessionalism and decided this clinic wasn't for her. I would give the Salvation Army a higher rating today compared to my beginnings with this clinic.....

Dr. Smith you will be missed!

originalText.text: Dr. Bukhman is a very good doctor who has always taken the time to discuss my concerns and questions.  He has been my primary care doctor for 7 years and I have always been treated well by all his staff.  This is a busy office and it can be sometimes be hard to get an appointment for a non-emergency visit but they have always fit me in when the matter was urgent.

originalText.text: Never met this doctor but the np who sub for her is whatever. Do not care about the patient. Rude and cold. She shouldn’t be in the medical field.Confirmed an apppntment for Dr. Bukhman. Got there and I was told the doctor is not in for that day.  There was not much patient that day but took me more than an hour to be seen. The assistants are rude, not friendly at all. Just chatty with each other and not doing their job properly. Worse office I’ve ever been to. Don’t go here
